user_query: I want to surprise my nephew with a superhero-themed birthday party. Fetch the details of 10 random superheroes and 10 random villains to create an immersive experience. Also, provide me with a random quote related to superheroes and another one related to villains.

TaskList.description: Fetch details of 10 random superheroes to gather information for the party.
Fetch details of 10 random villains to complement the superhero theme.
Retrieve a random quote related to superheroes to enhance the party theme.
Retrieve a random quote related to villains for a contrasting theme.
